subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Sanya Richards of the United States faltered in the last 100 meters, ceding the gold to Christine Ohuruogu of Britain with the slowest winning time in an Olympic 400 since 1972.
snippet: Sanya Richards of the United States faltered in the last 100 meters, ceding the gold to Christine Ohuruogu of Britain with the slowest winning time in an Olympic 400 since 1972.
